Title: [ANN] [PRE-SALE] NTOK | PEER TO PEER ONLINE EDUCATION PLATFORM
Body: Hello! Thanks for your interest in project. Talking about the blockchain integration there are 2 main purposes of using it.  Direct payment to tutors using crypto tokens on the Ethereum blockchain The students will know that they are paying the tutor directly, without paying a significant markup to a middleman  Rating system based on a blockchain. Only those students who have attended a lesson with a tutor can leave feedback on that tutor. It is technically impossible for anyone except the student to create, moderate, or delete any feedback. This guarantees that ratings are based exclusively on real experiences and are as reliable as possible. The tutor‚Äôs overall rating will be calculated based on a large number of parameters, including: an average rating for the previous 30 days (so that tutors who have received a large number of positive reviews over a prolonged period will not drop in ranking too much due to one bad review), a rating for the tutor‚Äôs course materials, and a rating for video lessons that the tutor has recorded. The students will be able to see and post these ratings separately.
